snippet.title: A.R.M - Absolutely Reliable Machine: Intro Trailler
snippet.description:
A.R.M - Absolutely Reliable Machine will be releasing on December 3th!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1230010/ARM_Absolutely_Reliable_Machine/



A.R.M is a 2D action game focused on Battle without moving. Enjoy a thrilling and tactical battle with simple action!
Take inevitable competition against fearful monsters that want to destroy our world!
